mapper.select: SELECT picture.picture_url,recycle_site.recycle_id FROM recycle_site,picture,album,user WHERE picture.picture_id=recycle_site.picture_id AND picture.album_id=album.album_id AND album.user_id=`user`.user_id AND `user`.user_id=#{id} AND picture.picture_status=0
mapper.update: UPDATE picture SET picture.picture_status=1 WHERE picture.picture_id=( SELECT recycle_site.picture_id FROM recycle_site WHERE recycle_site.recycle_id=#{id} )
